newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 13 issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 13 issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp. said it qualified 13 bond issues for insurance slated for competitive sale on Tuesday.
--Brasher Falls, N.Y., $3.5 million of school district bonds.
--Brunswick, N.Y., $3.7 million of school district bonds.
--Gouverneur, N.Y., $2 million of school district bonds.
--Otego-Unadilla CSD, N.Y., $5.4 million of school bonds.
--Washington, N.C., $2 million of GO sewer bonds.
--Madison County Board of Education, Ala., $10 million capital outlay bonds.
--San Francisco, Calif., $23 million of lease revenue bonds.
--New York City $200 million of GO bonds.
--Frisco, Texas, $2.5 million of taxable tax and revenue certificates.
--Frisco, Texas, $5.9 million of tax and revenue certificates.
--Frisco, Texas, $4.9 million of GO bonds. --U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
